questions.question: What is the roles of scrum master in agile development method?
answers: Protecting the team from outside interference and helps the team resolve issues or make improvements
He maintains and communicates to all other participants a clear vision of what the Scrum team is trying to achieve
Collaborates with internal and external stakeholders to gather and define the product backlog items
The only authority responsible for what will be developed and in what order

questions.question: For what kind purpose are used scenarios?
answers: Describe a successful user experience
Description of the normal flow of events and what can go wrong
Tool used by engineers requirements
All the answers are correct

questions.question: What is the main difference in the process of collecting and analyzing requirements between following two methods of development: waterfall and agile
answers: There is no difference between the methods
In agile the client can modify the requirements and add new requirements during the development process
In agile it is not possible to start the development process before all the requirements have been collected and analyzed
In waterfall the client can modify the requirements and add new requirements during the development process

questions.question: What are the types of tests?
answers: Structural tests and behavioral tests
Black box testing and white box testing
Alpha testing and beta testing
User testing and system testing

questions.question: What is TDD?
answers: Tests are written before the code. Tests are part of the development process
Each developer checks his own code
An experienced testing team that checks the code at the completion of the development process
Method that checks only the drivers of the progrem

questions.question: What are the differences between Walkthrough and Inspection
answers: Walkthrough is more formal then walkthrough
Inspection is more formal and more effective than Walkthrough
walkthrough is mor formal and more effective than inspection
Inspection is more effective then walkthrough

answers: Determine what will be in the review

Allows working according to fixed protocols and is not flexible
To combines the legacy technologies of a company with the newer technologies
A technology that replaces all existing systems in an organization with a single system

Layoffs

questions.question: Perform tests before releasing the system and after it has been released (in the customer's business), why?
